|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD 951 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -2n |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RB951-2n |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TV7RB951-2N |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9331;AR9331-AL1A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = (v7.4) |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F1208U0C-PCB0; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0C:42,D4:CA:6D |oui = 00:0C:42,D4:CA:6D
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = 30 |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.88.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = MikroTik |defaultssid_regex = ^MikroTik$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/11/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 700175496089 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B008W7WEV6 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00DBT6NJE |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Latvia
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48RNAA14.SGA" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Manuf. by [[Wistron NeWeb]], OUI: 00:0C:42 / D4:CA:6D
Default SSID and credentials are from the FCC submitted Quick Setup Guide. :Device may have a USB 2.0 port on some models / submodels.
{{see also|Wistron NeWeb|MikroTik}}
==Links of Interest== *[http://itsettings.blogspot.com/2012/03/mikrotik-routerboard-951-2n.html ''RB951-2n'' Specs] *[http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-marshrutizatora-Mikrotik-RB951G-2HnD ''RB951G-2HnD'' Review]
==See also== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 951-2n (RB951-2n)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB951-2n RB951-2n] ('''RB951-2n''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB951-2N TV7RB951-2N] :2.4GHz Wireless AP, 802.11bgn, 5x FE ports, PoE, :PoE-out on port 5, OUI: 00:0C:42 / D4:CA:6D :CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9331 @400MHz, 64/32MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 951G-2HnD (RB951G-2HnD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB951G-2HnD RB951G-2HnD] ('''RB951G-2HnD''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB951G-2HND TV7RRB951G-2HND] :2.4GHz Wireless AP, 802.11bgn, 5x GbE ports, 1x USB 2.0, PoE :POE-in/out on port 1/5, 2x MIMO 2.5dBi ant., OUI: D4:CA:6D :CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9344 @600MHz, 128/128MB <!--(Samsung NAND/2x Nanya DDR)--> ([http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-marshrutizatora-Mikrotik-RB951G-2HnD review]) *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP (RB951Ui-2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB951Ui-2nD RB951Ui-2nD] ('''hAP''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB951UI-2ND TV7RB951UI-2ND] :5x FE ports, PoE-out on port 5, USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: 00:0C:42, :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, 16/64MB, 24V/0.8A <!--(Flash Winbond (SPI)/RAM Nanya (DDR2))-->
[[Category:English Documentation]]
